attributes.action: Guarantee financial help to those out of work due to the Coronavirus outbreak.
attributes.additional_details: We want this to be done as firstly those that have to be self isolated or isolated at home will struggle to feed themselves or support their family as the time taken to recover can vary. The lack of money means there would be a knock on affect on every local economy. Finally not having to worry about income if you start showing any symptoms means you would not feel like you can't afford to be off of work, this would help prevent the spread of the virus.
attributes.background: We would like to government to ensure that  all people financially affected due to contracting the virus are financially supported.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. We're not sure if you mean people who aren't able to work because of self-isolation and aren't eligible for sick pay, in which case you might like to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300336
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
